bilingual.source: She often contemplates the meaning of being.
bilingual.target: 她经常思考存在的意义。

bilingual.source: The novel explores the nature of human being.
bilingual.target: 这部小说探讨了人类存在的本质。

bilingual.source: Meditation helps her connect with her inner being.
bilingual.target: 冥想帮助她与内在的存在联系起来。

bilingual.source: In Hindu mythology, a deva is a benevolent being.
bilingual.target: 在印度教神话中，神灵是一个仁慈的存在。

bilingual.source: The concept of being is central to many philosophical discussions.
bilingual.target: 存在的概念是许多哲学讨论的核心。

bilingual.source: A celestial being is often depicted as having magical powers.
bilingual.target: 仙人通常被描绘成拥有神奇力量的存在。

bilingual.source: There is a correlative link between exercise and mental well-being.
bilingual.target: 运动与心理健康之间存在相关的联系。

bilingual.source: Many believe that an omniscient being controls the universe.
bilingual.target: 许多人相信有一个无所不知的存在掌控着宇宙。

bilingual.source: The ancient texts describe a seraph as a being of pure light.
bilingual.target: 古代文献描述六翼天使为纯光的存在。

bilingual.source: Many people believe in an almighty being who controls the universe.
bilingual.target: 许多人相信有一个全能的存在掌控着宇宙。

list.abstract: Being,Inc.（ビーイング）是1978年于东京都港区设立的音乐制作公司，由长戸大幸创立。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, how about this for a topic: Why is Leonard being a giant douche? Assuming giant douches are possible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个话题怎么样：为什么莱纳德是个大混蛋？假设大混蛋有可能存在。

yingyinNormal.en: We're talking about a being whose very existence challenges our own sense of priority in the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在在讨论的这个人，他的存在挑战了我们自身对事物优先级别的认知。

yingyinNormal.en: While many proposals for higher level relationships -- or super families -- are speculative, some have been widely accepted and others are being considered, especially for native languages with small speaker populations that have not been extensively studied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多人推测存在更高层面的关系也就是超级语系，一些说法已经被广泛认同，另一些还有争议，特别是对只有较少人使用的语言还没有全面研究。

yingyinNormal.en: I need your help. You were talking about the cloud at my work, files being saved up to the cloud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要你帮忙，你之前提到我公司的云端的事，文件被保存在云端。

yingyinNormal.en: What kind of being are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是哪个种族的？

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for being there, you guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢你们出席我的毕业礼。

yingyinNormal.en: Now you're just being ridiculous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你扯过头了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, why are you being so weird?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你为什么要怪里怪气的？

yingyinNormal.en: What's wrong with being the Bings?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那有什么不对的？

yingyinNormal.en: Well you're being extremely unfair!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这样太不公平了！

yingyinNormal.en: The final key! It's being broadcast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后一把钥匙！在直播。

yingyinNormal.en: Being pregnant is hard on your tummy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怀孕真难吃东西。

yingyinNormal.en: You being the fish. I'm not the fish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这臭鱼说的就是你！我才不是这臭鱼呢。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. I was being absent-minded.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我刚刚走神了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, well, well! Now who's being rude?
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是谁无礼啊?

yingyinNormal.en: QA told us she was being decommissioned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 质保经理告诉我们她被废弃了。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course they are. Leonard's being one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然有，莱纳德就是一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Again. Stuart, please. You're being rude.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我再说一遍……拜托，斯图尔特，你这样很无礼。

yingyinNormal.en: They're nervous. They're being impulsive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们很紧张，也太冲动了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not failing. Being a mother is hard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不失败，是当妈妈很辛苦的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Similarly, children tend to treat robots as if they are fellow <highlight>beings</highlight>, even when they display only simple social signals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，即使机器人只表现出简单的社交信号，孩子们也倾向于将机器人视为同胞。

examination_example.sentence: In short, these are the types of jobs that machines can perform much better at than human <highlight>beings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，这些工作属于“机器可以比人做的更好”的类型。

examination_example.sentence: It might be philosophical,or mathematical, but in any case it must, in my view, have something to do with the soul of the human <highlight>being</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能是富于哲理的、或是精确无误的，但在我看来，不论在何种情况下，音乐都一定与人类的灵魂有某种关联。

examination_example.sentence: It turned from God and the authority of the Roman Catholic Church and instead favored a more humanistic approach to <highlight>being</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它背离了上帝和罗马天主教会的权威，而倾向于一种更人性化的存在方式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Although humans are more advanced and intelligent, animals are more genuine and authentic in their behavior and responses than human <highlight>beings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然人类更高级，更聪明，但动物的行为和反应比人类更真实可信。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The students, who were studying artificial intelligence, were interacting with the virtual assistant and couldn't tell it apart from a real human <highlight>being</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正在学习人工智能的学生们正在与虚拟助手互动，他们不能将它与真人区分开来。

examination_example.sentence: Stop to seek advice from a human <highlight>being</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 停下来向一个人寻求建议。

examination_example.sentence: Students risk health and well <highlight>being</highlight>, as well as performance in other end-of-term work, when faculty offers take-home exams without clear, time-limited boundaries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在老师们给出没有明确时间限制的课后考试时，学生们牺牲了健康和幸福，以及其他的期末功课。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 存在；生存；天性；特性；本质；生物；存在物；生活；有生命

word_family.mean: v. 存在；在；举行；发生；是；就是；说

examination_example.sentence: What does Mohan think of the future of digital <highlight>beings</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫汉对数字生物的未来有什么看法？

examination_example.sentence: Mohan is cautious about this approach, yet she supports the purpose behind these digital <highlight>beings</highlight> and is optimistic about where they are headed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫汉对这种方法持谨慎态度，但她支持这些数字生物背后的目的，并对它们的发展方向持乐观态度。

examination_example.sentence: Shiwali Mohan, an Al scientist at the Palo Research Center, is skeptical of these digital <highlight>beings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帕洛研究中心的人工智能科学家Shiwali Mohan对这些数字生物持怀疑态度。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He made great contributions to human <highlight>beings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他对人类做出了巨大的贡献。

examination_example.sentence: Jobs that used to be done by human beings are now <highlight>being</highlight> taken by robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去由人类完成的工作现在被机器人取代了。

examination_example.sentence: In the process, human <highlight>beings</highlight> still decide on the correct answers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个过程中，人类仍然决定正确的答案。
